title: Game freezes hard when someone dies
body: So this bug is very very annoying. How to deal with it? This bug exists for 2-3 years i think and it still didn't fixed.

replies.body: You pc might be having some kind of weird interaction between your game files and graphics drivers. Let's take a couple quick precautions by running a repair through the client options and checking for any possible graphics driver updates. Test that in a custom game, and let me know if it helps at all!
